content:
I’m a senior at University of Southern California, majoring in Electrical and Computer Engineering and Applied and Computational Mathematics. During my undergrad, I’m fortunate to be advised by Prof. Bhaskar Krishnamachari from the Autonomous Networks Research Group, working on dynamic optimizaiton in algorithmic economics and deep reinforcement learning in HRI. I was also fortunate to work as a research fellow under the advisement of Prof. John M. Dolan from The Robotics Institute at Carnegie Mellon University, focusing on active information gathering and influence in HRI with specific applications in the domain of autonomous driving. Currently, my undergraduate honors thesis centers around using deep reinforcement learning techniques in active information gathering in game-theoretical HRI.
CV

title: Shuangge Wang

summary: 2023 IEEE International Conference in Robotics and Automation (ICRA) (under review)
title: Active Probing and Influencing Human Behaviors Via Autonomous Agents

content: Spatial Separable Convolutional Neural Networks Parallelization and Accelerations
summary: Redesigned MobileNets’ kernel dimensions to reach more homogeneous convolution size for maximum parallelism; Adopted constant memory in CUDA to increase shared memory usage during 1D convolution
title: Spatial Separable Convolutional Neural Networks Parallelization and Accelerations

summary: 2023 IEEE International Conference in Blockchain and Cryptocurrency (ICBC) (acceptance rate 18.6%)
title: Optimal Trading on a Dynamic Curve Automated Market Maker

summary: Used PyTorch to develop the machine learning inference pipeline of a user data obfuscation Firefox extension, Implemented the extension in REST API and socket server and deployed the application to Docker environment (private due to IP reasons)
title: HARPO: Learning to Subvert Online Behavioral Advertising

summary: Developed ”Siemens Industrial Edge WeChat Mini Program” that interactively displays industrial data from Siemens industrial edge devices; established MQTT communication environment and deployed data-filtering APIs to cloud
title: Siemens Industrial Edge Wechat Mini-Program
